entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this morning. Wind becoming light this morning. High 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:52 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind light except south 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia this evening and after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 06:52 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023
